title: Context-Based Learning Design Techniques and Assembly Theory Application

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Work-integrated curriculum design for office/administrative working learners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze interactions between human and non-human actors within design tasks by applying assemblage theory
Learners can systematically identify and document socio-technical constraints when designing context-based tasks
Learners can plan, implement, and evaluate language design tasks reflecting community-based discourse
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
